## Problem 1

Code for loading "penguins" dataset and descriptions 

```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
penguins
nrow(penguins)
ncol(penguins)
mean(penguins$flipper_length_mm,na.rm = TRUE)
```

Description for "penguins" dataset

* The "penguins" dataset has factors ("species", "island", "sex"), doubles ("bill_length_mm", "bill_depth_mm"), integers ("flipper_length_mm", "body_mass_g", "year").  

* There are 344 rows and 8 columns in the dataset.

* After removing missing data, the mean flipper length is 200.9152 mm.
